Title: Gotham Men's Gun Metal Ultra Thin Bold Number Open Face Quartz Pocket Watch #...
Description: Gotham Men's Gun Metal Ultra Thin Bold Number Open Face Quartz Pocket Watch # GWC15033BBK Rich black dial with extra bold white numbers and extra thick white hands perfect for low vision Classic open face gun metal finish pocket watch with ultra thin polished brass case suitable for engraving Precision Japanese analog quartz movement Includes 14 inch gun metal finish curb link chain with belt clip holder attachment Arrives with deluxe draw string pouch and gift box, operating instructions and lifetime limited warranty card This highly polished gun metal finish open face ultra thin pocket watch is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include a rich black dial with bold easy to read white numbers and extra thick white hands to make this the perfect pocket watch for those who have trouble seeing the time. The precision Japanese quartz movement never needs winding so you will always be on time. Also included is a 14 inch deluxe curb link chain with belt clip attachment. This beautiful pocket watch will arrive in an attractive velour burgundy gift pouch then boxed in gift packaging that does not need wrapping.
